instrupy.radiometer_model.TotalPowerRadiometerSystem¶

class instrupy.radiometer_model.TotalPowerRadiometerSystem(tlLoss=None, tlPhyTemp=None, rfAmpGain=None, rfAmpInpNoiseTemp=None, rfAmpGainVariation=None, mixerGain=None, mixerInpNoiseTemp=None, mixerGainVariation=None, ifAmpGain=None, ifAmpInputNoiseTemp=None, ifAmpGainVariation=None, integratorVoltageGain=None, predetectionGain=None, predetectionInpNoiseTemp=None, predetectionGainVariation=None, integrationTime=None, bandwidth=None, _id=None)[source]¶

Class to handle total power radiometer system. Refer Section 7.4, 7.5 in [1].

Variables

  • tlLoss (float) – Transmission line loss in decibels.

  • tlPhyTemp (float) – Transmission line physical temperature in Kelvin.

  • rfAmpGain (float) – RF amplifier gain in decibels.

  • rfAmpInpNoiseTemp (float) – RF amplifier input noise temperature in Kelvin.

  • rfAmpGainVariation (float) – RF amplifier gain variation. Linear units.

  • mixerGain (float) – Mixer gain in decibels.

  • mixerInpNoiseAmp (float) – Mixer input noise temperature in Kelvin.

  • mixerGainVariation (float) – Mixer gain variation. Linear units.

  • ifAmpGain (float) – Intermediate frequency amplifier gain in decibels.

  • ifAmpInpNoiseTemp (float) – Intermediate frequency amplifier input noise temperature in Kelvin.

  • ifAmpGainVariation (float) – IF amplifier gain variation. Linear units.

  • integratorVoltageGain (float) – Integrator voltage gain (unitless).

  • predetectionGain (float) – Pre-detection stage gain in decibels.

  • predetectionInpNoiseTemp (float) – Pre-detection input noise temperature in Kelvin.

  • predetectionGainVariation (float) – Pre-detection stage gain variation. Linear units.

  • integrationTime (float) – Integration time in seconds.

  • bandwidth (float) – Pre-detection bandwidth in (Hertz).

  • _id (str or int) – Unique identifier.
